comment.author: 54520314@N07
comment._content: Awesome past. Wish could be there for a moment.

comment.author: 16539959@N04
comment._content: A great picture of a place I know well.  Some of the buildings are still there, but the church in the background was bombed in WWII and demolished to be replaced by 'Peace Gardens'.  In England streetcars are called 'trams'.
